TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> class. The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> in an unusable state. After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> object's `Finalize` method.
The Dispose method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. The `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`. The <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When `disposing` is `true`, the Dispose method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesigner> references. The Dispose method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
